name: Hotel Monjas del Carmen

reviews.text: This is the best hotel I've stayed in while in Spain for 5 weeks. The bed and pillow are very comfortable, the room is quiet, the breakfast is good value with options available. The only issue is that the wifi is a bit sporadic, dropping out a bit. All five of us are happy with the hotel. Great location too!
reviews.title: Best bed and pillow

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you travel to Granada to see Al Hambra, this is the place to stay. A modern, supercentrally located, reasonably priced hotel. Very conveniently located at the bottom of the Al Hambra hill. Plenty of good restaurants close by. Underground garage.
reviews.title: Close to Al Hambra

reviews.text: Lovely hotel in centre of Granada within walking distance of Alhambra and restaurants. Rooms and bathrooms beautifully appointed with crisp white bedding, wonderfully clean. This hotel was better than some 4 and 5 star hotels we have stayed in. The 2 receptionists were really helpful speaking excellent English. There is also a underground carpark. It's a bit hard to find and you must give the hotel your car registration and name so that you can drive in restricted areas which have automatic bollards in the road. The receptionists will talk you through directions. One of the nicest hotels we have stayed In.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: Upon arrival, we were met by a charming and friendly front desk staff Anna who really made us feel welcome the minute we stepped into the hotel. Although the rooms were a bit small and there was no coffee making facilities, they were clean and the location of this hotel totally made up for it. Restaurants, even halal ones, shops, taxis and other amenities are just steps away from the hotel. We truly enjoyed our stay here and a visit to the magnificent Alhambra and the Sierra Nevada mountains are a must. We will definitely stay here again the next time we visit Granada!
reviews.title: nice and charming, a gem in the city

reviews.text: Nice hotel located inside a small lane very close to plaza nueva, in the town.Very convienient the road to Alhambra is just behind the hotel, there are mini buses to alhambra operating frequently.Very good area for Night life in Granada, resturants ,tapas bars ,gift shops all in one place.We stayed there during the weekend but it was very quiet we had room overlooking the entrance however did not hear any noise.
reviews.title: Hotel in a good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Monjas del Carmen was an an excellent choice from T/A recommendations. Hotel Monjas del Carmen is an attractive and modern hotel situated in a quiet street in the hub of Granada's attractions - L'Alhambra / Mirador de San Nicolas /Albayzin - all only a short walk away. Room 307 was spacious and welcoming. It had a large stylish bathroom with a snazzy hairdrier. The bed was the most comfortable we had slept on in our 6 weeks of European traveling. Manuel's Restaurant adjacent to this hotel provides a delicious breakfast - (eggs done to perfection). Breakfast is discounted if ordered at the hotel reception prior.Value for money this hotel has to be seen to be believed! Top Tip:- Visit restaurant on tier below Mirador San Nicolas (tucked out of sight) for a drink or meal - perfect spot to watch sun go down over L'Alhambra.
reviews.title: Value for money in an excellent location

reviews.text: Ideal location for a trip to Granada.
reviews.title: Grea location in the old town

reviews.text: Located in the old town and within walking disance of the Alhambra Palace. About a 15 minute walk up a steady incline to he Alahambra gate. Make sure that you pre-book your tickets as entry tickets to the main palace do, on occasions, run out. This gives an entry time slot - we picked the first openning at 8.30 am to avoid most of the queue.
reviews.title: great location, excellent service, lovely stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked the Alhambra on line in the hotel using the free WIFI and picked the tickets up from the book shop around the corner from the hotel - approximately 100 meters away.
reviews.title: excellent location, good price-quality

reviews.text: Hotel is modern and clean with friendly and helpful staff.
reviews.title: A great hotel in a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for three nights midweek in June. Chose hotel for its location and value and it did not disappoint. We had a 'front' room above a restaurant with outside seating and opposite a popular bar. On one night (a night before a public holiday) this was noisy till around 1pm, the other two nights were quiet. I imagine it could also be noisy at the weekend. The room itself was smallish but comfortable and perfectly adequate for a short stay. reception was good.
reviews.title: great location, good value.

reviews.text: We stayed here for only 1 nite to visit the Alhambra and were very happy with the location, cleanliness and the efficient reception of this hotel.
reviews.title: Ideal location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just meters from Plaza Nueva there are plenty of eateries taxis and buses nearby. The Granada Cathedral is just around the corner and ½ km away Navas road suggested by the hotel has so many restaurants for Tapas etc for lunch and dinner.
reviews.title: Fantastic location, modern and comfortable hotel
Lovely small hotel was a great choice in Grenada
reviews.text: The Monjas del Carmen is situated down a beautiful street just off the Plaza Nueva; the perfect location if, like us, you want to spend your time sightseeing and frequenting various bars. The hotel is beautiful, very clean and comfortable. The staff were friendly and helpful. Highly recommended.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed a large room, comfortable bed and shower and close proximity to restaurants. Lunch in the hotel bar was very good.
reviews.title: excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a beautiful modern hotel in the heart of old Granada. The location is ideal. Rooms are generously sized, comfortable and clean. Excellent air conditioning (we visited in July, with outside temperatures pushing 40 Celsius). Solid double glazing means no unwelcome noise even while the bars just outside are full and lively. Receptionists were very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Ideal base for exploring Granada

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Out three night stay at this hotel was perfect. The hotel has been recently renovated and is bright and airy. Its location at the end of a cul de sac makes it quiet and the staff are exceptionally friendly. They went out of their way to accommodate all our requests & made us feel very welcome.
reviews.title: An Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is optional and they have a selection of fixed price options. It is a little more expensive than at one of the many coffee shops in the area, but, nevertheless good value for money.
reviews.title: An ideal place to stay in Granada

reviews.text: The hotel is perfectly situated for the major attractions of central Granada, all of which are within easy walking distance. The taxi from the Granada Estacion de Autobus costs around Euro 6.00 and the taxi rank is in the street about 50m from the hotel. Very convenient.
reviews.title: Good location if you are going to the Alahambra

reviews.text: We would not hesitate to stay there again.
reviews.title: Great hotel, great location, even greater value!!

description: The new Hotel Monjas del Carmen is located in the historic city center of Granada, at the confluence of the neighborhoods of the Albaicin (Muslims), Realejo (Jewish), at the foot of the Alhambra and next to the Cathedral and main monuments, tapas bars, entertainment and businessarea.Its 32 rooms are equipped with the latest technology in air conditioning and soundproofing. There is private parking in the building, exclusive use of our clients.The perfect choice to visit Granada
